Types

SegmentTreeBeats[S; F] = object
  default: S
  merge: proc (x: S; y: S): S
  arr*: seq[S]
  lazy*: seq[F]
  mapping: proc (f: F; x: S): S
  composition: proc (f, g: F): F
  id: F
  lastnode: int
  log: int
  length: int
